feed.title: Track Awesome Software Patreons Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome programmers and software projects you can support!

entry.content:
People Doing Open Source Work / Hardware related

entry.title: Awesome Software Patreons Updates on Feb 12 - Feb 18, 2024
entry.content:
Open Source Projects

  • Neovim - Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability.
  • PHPStan - PHP static analyzer.
  • Termux - Android terminal emulator.
  • V Programming Language - Statically typed compiled programming language similar to Go, influenced by Oberon, Rust, Swift.
  • Kitbashery - 3D kitbashing solution & CC0 model library.

Open Source Projects / Libraries

  • ApexCharts - JavaScript charts library.
entry.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Feb 12 - Feb 18, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Software Patreons Updates on Feb 05 - Feb 11, 2024
entry.content:
Open Source Projects / Messaging and social media

  • Dekko Project - Ubuntu email client.
  • Nitter, #2, #3 - Free and open source Twitter client focused on privacy.

Open Source Projects / Games

  • Improved Initiative - D&D tabletop role-playing game combat tracker.

Open Source Projects / Open Source Art

  • GIMP - GNU Image Manipulation Program.
  • Morevna Project - Various contributions to open source animation tools and animated shorts sources released under CC.
  • MyPaint - Painting and drawing program that works nicely with pressure-sensitive tablets, and its dynamic brush engine library.
  • Pablo Dobarro - Sculpting improvements for Blender.
  • Synfig, #2 - 2D animation software.

Open Source Projects / Hardware related

  • DIGImend - Improving Linux support for (non-Wacom) graphics tablets.
  • LibrePCB - Software to develop printed circuit boards.
  • OctoPrint - Web interface for 3D printers.
  • OpenRGB - RGB lighting control application.
entry.summary: 12 awesome projects updated on Feb 05 - Feb 11, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Software Patreons Updates on Jan 22 - Jan 28, 2024
entry.content:
Open Source Projects

  • Blender - 3D creation suite
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Jan 22 - Jan 28, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Software Patreons Updates on Jan 15 - Jan 21, 2024
entry.content:
Open Source Projects

  • Bottles - Easily manage and run Windows apps on Linux.
  • OptiKey, #2 - Full computer control and speech with your eyes.
  • Sonic Pi - Code-based music creation and performance tool.
  • Tiled, #2, #3 - A 2D game level editor.

Open Source Projects / Messaging and social media

  • BookWyrm, #2 - Social reading and reviewing, decentralized with ActivityPub.
  • Flarum - Forum platform.
  • Funkwhale - A free, federated and social music server.
  • The Lounge - Modern web IRC client.
  • Mastodon, #2 - Federated social network server.
  • Matrix, #2 - An open network for secure, decentralized communication.
  • MissKey - Federated microblogging platform.
  • PixelFed, #2, #3, #4 - Federated image sharing powered by the ActivityPub protocol.
  • postActiv - Microblogging platform.
  • Reddit Enhancement Suite - Reddit browser extension.
  • Retrospring, #2, #3 - A social network following the Q/A (question and answer) principle.
  • Secure Scuttlebutt - A distributed and secure peer-to-peer protocol and social network.

Open Source Projects / Operating Systems

  • PostmarketOS - A real Linux distribution for phones.

Other kinds of content / Articles and Tutorials

  • Boiling Steam, #2 - Linux gaming news, reviews, guides.
entry.summary: 18 awesome projects updated on Jan 15 - Jan 21, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Software Patreons Updates on Jun 05 - Jun 11, 2023
entry.content:
Open Source Projects

  • NewPipe - FLOSS video player on Android for services like YouTube, Soundcloud etc.

Open Source Projects / Libraries

  • Iced, #2 - A cross-platform GUI library for Rust, inspired by Elm.

Open Source Projects / Hardware related

  • Martin Povišer - Reverse-engineering and writing Linux drivers for audio hardware on Apple Silicon Macs.

Other kinds of content / Articles and Tutorials

  • GamingOnLinux - articles and videos about Linux, Steam Deck, SteamOS gaming.
entry.summary: 4 awesome projects updated on Jun 05 - Jun 11, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Software Patreons Updates on May 16 - May 22, 2022
entry.content:
Open Source Projects

  • LogSeq - Knowledge management
  • Memcode - Platform for flashcards

Open Source Projects / Open Source Art

  • Alexandre Prokoudine, #2 - GIMP contributor, editor of Libre Graphics World online magazine.
  • Andrea Ferrero - Developer of PhotoFlow image editor, maintains various Appimage packages.
  • Duduf - Tools for animations and motion pictures production.
  • Inochi2D - Opensource editor and libraries for realtime 2D puppet animation and rendering, e.g. VTubers.
  • Marc Jeanmougin - Inkscape contributor.
  • Øyvind Kolås, #2 - Lead developer of babl & GEGL libraries used in the graphics editor GIMP.
  • Tavmjong Bah - Working on Inkscape vector graphics editor.
  • ZeMarmot, #2, #3 - 2D animation film project to be released under CC. GIMP contributions from Jehan Pagès, art and direction by Aryeom Han.

Open Source Projects / Hardware related

  • Damien Maguire - Electric vehicle projects.
  • Espruino - JavaScript interpreter for microcontrollers.
  • Frank Buss - FPGA and other hardware projects.
  • GitClear - Improved Linux support for touchpads.
  • Hector Martin "marcan", #2 - Asahi, Linux support for Apple Silicon Macs.
  • Nefarius Software Solutions - Windows drivers for the Sony DualShock controller and others.
  • Pinout.xyz - Pinout diagrams for various microcontrollers.
  • Professor Abrasive - Retro gaming.

People Doing Open Source Work / Hardware related

  • Luke Dashjr - Author of bfgminer and other substantial contributions to Bitcoin.
entry.summary: 19 awesome projects updated on May 16 - May 22, 2022

entry.title: Awesome Software Patreons Updates on Oct 21 - Oct 27, 2019
entry.content:
Open Source Projects

  • Kismet, #2 - Kismet wireless tool.
  • openage - Real time strategy game engine.

  • Wiki.js, #2, #3 - Wiki platform built with Node.js.

Open Source Projects / Libraries

  • Vapor, #2 - Server-side Swift framework.

Open Source Projects / Operating Systems

  • Serenity OS #2 - A graphical Unix-like OS for x86, with 90s aesthetics.

People Doing Open Source Work / Hardware related

  • Daniel Gultsch - Conversations Jabber client.
  • David Hewitt - ElementaryOS contributor, Torrential, Clipped.
  • Dimitri Fontaine - Various contributions to the PostgreSQL ecosystem (pgloader, pg_auto_failover), Emacs libraries (el-get), author.
  • Dominik Honnef, #2 - Working on tooling for the Go programming language.
  • Ethan Lee - Contributions to FNA, SDL2 C# and other projects.
  • Felipe Lima - Various projects and libraries like OkReplay, AirMapView, AsymmetricGridView, GifImageView, Wombat.
  • Gabriel Gonzalez - Dhall language, Nix and Haskell educational projects and Haskell libraries and tool.
  • Gilbert Pellegrom - Raneto, Vue.js libraries and more.
  • James 'Purpleidea' - mgmt config, articles and more.
  • Kévin Dunglas - API Platform, Vulcain, Mercure and Symfony contributions.
  • Khoa Pham - A multitude of libraries, applications and articles about iOS/Cocoa,
  • Lars Moelleken - Various PHP libraries and OSS contributions.
  • Matt Lewis - Angular-calendar and other angular components.
  • Matthieu Napoli - Bref, PHP-DI and other PHP libraries.
  • Max Bridgland - Various pentesting frameworks and tools.
  • Nick Sweeting - ArchiveBox and OSS contributions but also articles and documentation.
  • Nicolas Hafner - Various Common Lisp libraries.
  • Oleh Krehel - GNU Emacs plugins, maintainer of Ivy/Swiper/Counsel, Hydra, Avy, Lispy, and more.
  • Pedro Piñera - Tuist and XcodeProj libraries, articles.
  • Pedro Carrasco - Various iOS libraries and projects.
  • Sanjay Madan, #2 - Mowglii apps, author of Itsycal and Snk.
  • Stéphane Peter - AudioKit contributor, Makeself and other libraries and projects.
  • Tim Oliver - Multitude of iOS libraries and various contribution to the iOS ecosystem.

entry.title: Awesome Software Patreons Updates on Jan 21 - Jan 27, 2019
entry.content:
Open Source Projects

  • bcachefs - Linux filesystem.
  • Calibre - E-books manager.
  • Deluge - BitTorrent client.
  • DokuWiki - Wiki application.
  • Homebrew - Package manager for macOS.
  • MuseScore - Music notation software.
  • OpenShot - Video editor.
  • Paperwork - Personal document manager.
  • PlantUML - UML diagram creation software.
  • Project Lombok - Java editor plugin.
  • SysV init - System V init implementation.
  • Transmission - BitTorrent client.
  • VideoLAN - Maker of the VLC video player.

Open Source Projects / Libraries

  • Laravel - PHP framework.
  • LibGDX - Game development framework.
  • Moleculer - Progressive microservices framework for Node.js.
  • Vue.js - Vue.js.
  • Yii framework - PHP framework.

Open Source Projects / Operating Systems

  • GhostBSD - Desktop-focused BSD OS.
  • Linux Lite - Linux distribution.
  • Ubuntu Mate - Ubuntu variant.

Open Source Projects / Games

  • Libretro Team - Libretro, RetroArch and Lakka.

People Doing Open Source Work / Hardware related

  • Andreas Kainz - LibreOffice designer.
  • Andreas Pardeike - Programming tutorials, games and mods.
  • Drew DeVault, #2, #3 - sway, wlroots, sr.ht, scdoc, aerc, and more.
  • Eevee - Games, applications and articles.
  • Fabio Zadrozny - Working on PyDev and related projects.
  • Joey Hess - git-annex, keysafe, other Linux software.
  • Jonathan Müller - Various C++ libraries, tools, articles.
  • Kozec - Syncthing-GTK and SC-Controller.
  • Kurt Kremitzki, #2 - FreeCAD contributor and Debian packager.
  • Nils Maier - Download Them All! Firefox and Chrome extension.
  • Ondřej Surý - Debian packager.
  • Patrick Wardle - Owner of Objective-See, various macOS security tools and articles.
  • Rekka Bellum & Devine Lu Linvega - Open source tools and games.
  • Rob Landley - Working on Toybox, mkroot and various other projects.
  • Scott Lahteine - Contributor to Marlin Firmware for 3D printers.
  • Sindre Sorhus - Countless open source projects.
  • Steven Troughton-Smith - Various iOS/macOS software.
  • Thomas M. Edwards - Gaming related projects.
  • Timothée Giet - GCompris contributor.
  • Yorik van Havre, #2 - FreeCAD contributor.

Other kinds of content / Articles and Tutorials

  • DistroWatch - Reviews and tutorials for Linux/BSD.

Other kinds of content / Podcasts

  • The Debug Log - Game development.
entry.summary: 44 awesome projects updated on Jan 21 - Jan 27, 2019
